idea:
NowDoctor is all about making healthcare services convenient and accessible for everyone. Whether you choose telehealth with a video consultation or an in-home visit, we are able to provide the highest quality of care for patients. We accomplish it all through the power of technology and the experience of our medical professionals.

We can provide online consultation through health professionals from following medical domains:

    – General Practitioner

    – Obstetrician/Gynecologist

    – Pediatrician

    – Psychiatrists

Our video consultation app allows doctors and patients to connect remotely. You choose the time and length of the appointment. The video consultation can be conducted completely in the comfort of your own home. We have designed our digital platform to be easy to use by all people, even those who may not be the most tech-savvy. This allows you to avoid long and fruitless hospital queues. Patients with disability can get treatment from the comfort of their private space and at their own time convenience.
name: NowDoctor Pvt Ltd

idea: TO PROVIDE VALUED ONLINE CUSTOMERS WITH QUICK DELIVERY OF QUALITY FMCG PRODUCTS. TO EMPLOY THE LATEST IN INTERNET E-BUISINESS TECH. IN TRANSACTING ONLINE BUSINESS.
